greetings: Hello. I am recommendations bot from tastekid.com.
help:
Supported commands:
/start Print startup info
/help Print supported commands
 /r Get recommendations of any type 
 And more specific:
/rbooks /rauthors /rmusic /rmovies /rshows /rgames 
Example query : /rbooks Ray Bradbury
 Retrieves all books similar to Bradbury`s
